prenatal.title: Prenatal Care
prenatal.description: Thorough monitoring of your pregnancy with regular checkups, education, and empathetic support so you experience a safe and calm journey to motherhood.

highRisk.title: High-Risk Pregnancies
highRisk.description: Advanced monitoring and updated protocols for pregnancies with special conditions, prioritizing maternal-fetal safety and informed decisions.

gynecology.title: General Gynecology
gynecology.description: Preventive checkups, Pap smears, colposcopy, and intimate health care throughout all life stages.

surgery.title: Gynecologic Surgery
surgery.description: Minimally invasive procedures and emergency surgical care focused on quick recovery and personalized follow-up.

ultrasound.title: Obstetric Ultrasound
ultrasound.description: Ultrasound and maternal-fetal Doppler evaluations to monitor your baby's well-being and anticipate complications.

urogynecology.title: Cervical Pathology & Urogynecology
urogynecology.description: Diagnosis and treatment of cervical conditions, incontinence, and pelvic floor issues with a respectful, comprehensive approach.

about.title: Meet Dr. Kristhy
about.subtitle: Evidence-based care with empathy and active listening.
bio: I’m Dr. Kristhy Moreno, Specialist in Obstetrics & Gynecology. Since 2013 I’ve cared for women with warmth and clinical rigor so they feel safe and supported.
I trained at Universidad de los Andes (ULA) and Hospital Central de San Cristóbal, managing emergencies, surgeries, and high-risk pregnancies while prioritizing maternal-fetal safety.
I build personalized plans with clear communication and active listening, so every decision is made with confidence and understanding.
about.education: Physician and Specialist in Obstetrics & Gynecology (ULA). Diplomas in Public and Occupational Health. Ongoing training in maternal-fetal Doppler.

philosophy.title: My Care Philosophy
content: The doctor-patient relationship comes first: I listen, accompany, and respect your decisions to deliver humanized care.
I guide every reproductive stage with clear communication so you understand each step and feel supported and safe.
I use evidence-based protocols and multidisciplinary teams when needed, blending clinical precision with genuine warmth.
